what.paragraph1: A variation upon Scott McCloud's original 24h comic challenge, which was started in the 90s. The challenge is simple, make a comic in a limited amount of time, at the rate of one page per hour. So in this case, 12 hours to make 12 pages.
what.paragraph2: The point is to have fun and challenge yourself. Managing to finish it in time is very hard and a lot of professional people have failed ! (For example, Neil Gaiman !) So don't be afraid to try and fail !
how.paragraph1: You will meet at 9:00 at ISAK culture center. Illustrator and comic artist Juliette Van Vlaenderen, better known online as Neicha's art will introduce the rules of the event, provide tips on how to succeed and randomly pick this year's theme from a hat.
how.paragraph2: You will then pick your desk in ISAK's loft where you will be provided with basic materials (inks, pens, paper etc). You're also welcome to take your own art supplies. ISAK will provide dinner and snacks as well as free coffee and tea.
how.paragraph3: When you're done, or when the event is over, the comics will be uploaded to the event's website. You can choose to promote your social medias/ website, use a pseudonym, or opt out.
